actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code in order to remove the limitation on the number of Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps units which may be established and other limitations regarding such units.

summary.text: Removes the limitation on the number of Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps units which may be established. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 2031 (a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code in order to remove the limitation on the number of Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps units which may be established and other limitations regarding such units.
